channel.title: Rscdef
channel.description:
Why this source never got used? I know it looks complicated at first, but you get used to it. It would be better option instead of RSCD based servers.
Protosstribe put a lot of time and work to it, and it went to waste.

item.title: Rscdef
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

-Nothing is correct, I had “all of ephermerals aka protosstribes” sources before they were even released here, he didn’t have time to to Improve them nor add features. However, if anybody who had any decent programming knowledge took the time to take a look, slowly but surely it could be made into something great.

Read full topic

item.title: Rscdef
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

OMG guys stop, your gonna burn the place down with all these flames!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Rscdef
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Anc13ntsIsBack, post:7, topic:394126”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=491312.msg3593905#msg3593905 date=1304883136]

I haven’t even seen or heard of the project before, but there’s usually a reason why that’s the case… It’s probably feature-less or whatever if no-one has ever used it.

If you haven’t seen it, nor heard from it, you can’t just say that it’s worse than RSCD. Dumbass.

It was never used because people have become too attached to RSCD, even if there’s better sources around. It does have some features, and everything is done what you need for adding more.
[/quote]
Quit backing it up & work on it yourself if you’re telling other people how good it is.[/quote]
There’s a reason I’m backing it up, and who the fuck you are to tell me what to do?

Also quit acting smart, when you clearly aren’t smart.

Read full topic

item.title: Rscdef
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

That’s exactly what I mean, protosstribe told us that it needs some improving/fixing though. But it’s still better than RSCD.

item.title: Rscdef
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

1 thread per client approach and the area system was never properly tested. It was all an experiment. One thing that was good from it is that it has the lowest latency/delay from any other server made which makes the “feel” more like RSC.

Read full topic

item.title: Rscdef
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

I would if I wouldn’t already have started doing google again.

I really suggest to use this for the official server.

EDIT: FreeToPK, Remove that damn censor, I’ve never done anything to have a reason to it being censored.
